text: is a Japanese football player for SC Sagamihara on loan from Nagoya Grampus. ==Career== After being raised by Nagoya Grampus U-18, Kajiyama was promoted to the top team in 2017 and then loaned to SC Sagamihara in September 2018.http://nagoya- grampus.jp/news/pressrelease/2018/0905-sc-1.phphttp://www.scsagamihara.com/news/post/20180905001 ==Club statistics== Updated to 3 September 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 149 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
